filmography.title: Beau Geste
filmography.role_description: The childhood friend and love interest of the Geste brothers, whom they leave behind to join the Foreign Legion.
filmography.plot: Three brothers join the French Foreign Legion to escape a scandal involving a stolen gem and face a tyrannical sergeant in the desert.

filmography.title: Reap the Wild Wind
filmography.role_description: A spirited southern belle whose stowaway attempt on a salvage ship leads to a tragic underwater encounter with a giant squid.
filmography.plot: A ship captain and a lawyer fight over a salvage business and a woman in the 1840s Florida Keys.

filmography.title: The Hairy Ape
filmography.role_description: A spoiled, wealthy socialite who insults a ship's stoker, triggering his existential crisis in this Eugene O'Neill adaptation.
filmography.plot: A brutish stoker on a transatlantic liner is shaken when a rich passenger refers to him as a 'filthy beast'.

filmography.title: Canyon Passage
filmography.role_description: A woman engaged to a wealthy man who finds herself drawn to a rugged mule skinner in the Oregon frontier.
filmography.plot: A mule freight owner in 1856 Oregon balances business, romance, and Native American uprisings.

filmography.title: Smash-Up, the Story of a Woman
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer who gives up her career for her husband's success, only to spiral into severe alcoholism.
filmography.plot: A singer sacrifices her career for her songwriter husband, but his success leads her to depression and the bottle.

filmography.title: The Lost Moment
filmography.role_description: A repressed young woman living in a gothic Venetian mansion, haunted by the secrets of her centenarian aunt.
filmography.plot: A publisher travels to Venice to retrieve the lost love letters of a famous poet, encountering a mysterious household.

filmography.title: Tap Roots
filmography.role_description: A headstrong Southern woman in Mississippi who gets caught up in a local secession movement against the Confederacy.
filmography.plot: A Mississippi county attempts to secede from the Confederacy during the Civil War, led by an abolitionist family.

filmography.title: Tulsa
filmography.role_description: A driven cattleman's daughter who transforms into a ruthless oil tycoon to avenge her father's death.
filmography.plot: A rancher's daughter builds an oil empire in 1920s Oklahoma, sacrificing her ethics and relationships for power.

filmography.title: House of Strangers
filmography.role_description: A strong-willed woman who falls for a lawyer, despite his vengeful obsession with his tyrannical banking father.
filmography.plot: A patriarch's control over his banking empire and his sons leads to resentment and a plot for revenge within the family.
filmography.awards: Cannes Film Festival: Win – Best Actor (Edward G. Robinson)

filmography.title: My Foolish Heart
filmography.role_description: A woman who reflects on her tragic wartime romance and unwed pregnancy that led to her current unhappy marriage.
filmography.plot: A woman's unhappy marriage triggers memories of her true love, a soldier who was killed during World War II.

filmography.title: Rawhide
filmography.role_description: A tough, independent woman held hostage with a station master by escaped convicts at a remote stagecoach stop.
filmography.plot: An assistant at a remote stagecoach station and a stranded woman are held hostage by four outlaws intending to rob the next gold shipment.

filmography.title: I Can Get It for You Wholesale
filmography.role_description: An ambitious and ruthless model who climbs her way to the top of the ruthless New York garment district.
filmography.plot: An ambitious fashion designer steps on everyone in her path to reach the top of the garment industry.

filmography.title: David and Bathsheba
filmography.role_description: The biblical beauty whose illicit affair with King David brings divine wrath upon Israel.
filmography.plot: King David falls in love with the wife of one of his soldiers, leading to adultery, betrayal, and a crisis of faith.

filmography.title: With a Song in My Heart
filmography.role_description: A biopic of the singer Jane Froman, who fought to rebuild her career after being crippled in a plane crash.
filmography.plot: The true story of singer Jane Froman, who was severely injured in a plane crash but courageously made a comeback.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; Golden Globe: Win – Best Actress (Musical/Comedy)

filmography.title: The Snows of Kilimanjaro
filmography.role_description: A wealthy widow who cares for her dying writer husband on safari, enduring his memories of a lost love.
filmography.plot: Writer Harry Street reflects on his life as he lies dying from an infection while on safari in the shadow of Mount Kilimanjaro.

filmography.title: The Lusty Men
filmography.role_description: The pragmatic wife of a rodeo rider who wants him to quit the dangerous circuit and settle down.
filmography.plot: A retired rodeo star mentors a young man in the sport, but the young man's wife opposes the dangerous lifestyle.

filmography.title: The President's Lady
filmography.role_description: The controversial wife of Andrew Jackson, whose previous divorce becomes a political scandal.
filmography.plot: Andrew Jackson defends his wife's honor against slanderous attacks regarding her previous marriage as he rises to the Presidency.

filmography.title: White Witch Doctor
filmography.role_description: A nurse who travels to the Congo to assist in a medical mission and teams up with a cynical hunter.
filmography.plot: A nurse arrives in Africa to join a medical mission and hires a hunter to guide her into the interior, where they face danger and romance.

filmography.title: Demetrius and the Gladiators
filmography.role_description: The seductive and manipulative Roman empress who tries to corrupt a Christian gladiator.
filmography.plot: A Christian slave is sentenced to the arena, where his faith is tested by the brutality of the games and the seduction of Messalina.

filmography.title: Garden of Evil
filmography.role_description: A woman who hires a group of adventurers to rescue her husband from a gold mine trapped in Apache territory.
filmography.plot: Three soldiers of fortune are hired by a woman to rescue her husband from a gold mine located in sacred Indian territory.

filmography.title: Soldier of Fortune
filmography.role_description: A woman who travels to Hong Kong to find her missing photographer husband, enlisting the help of a smooth smuggler.
filmography.plot: A woman searches for her missing husband in Hong Kong and hires an American mercenary to help her brave Red China to find him.

filmography.title: I'll Cry Tomorrow
filmography.role_description: The biographical role of Lillian Roth, a Broadway star who battles a devastating descent into alcoholism.
filmography.plot: The true story of singer Lillian Roth, whose stardom is destroyed by sixteen years of alcoholism before she finds redemption.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; Cannes Film Festival: Win – Best Actress

filmography.title: I Want to Live!
filmography.role_description: A hard-living woman with a criminal past who is convicted of murder and faces the gas chamber, claiming innocence to the end.
filmography.plot: The story of Barbara Graham, a woman with a criminal record who is accused of murder and fights for her life on death row.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Actress; Golden Globe: Win – Best Actress (Drama)

filmography.title: Back Street
filmography.role_description: A fashion designer who maintains a lifelong, secret affair with a married WWII veteran.
filmography.plot: A career woman carries on a long-term affair with a married man, sacrificing her own happiness for his love.

filmography.title: Valley of the Dolls
filmography.role_description: An aging, ruthless Broadway legend who refuses to be upstaged by younger talent, famously demanding a wig be returned.
filmography.plot: Three women navigate the cutthroat world of show business, succumbing to pills and heartbreak, while clashing with an older star.
